Feature ui.grid.moveColumns allows moving column to a different position. To enable, you must include the ui.grid.moveColumns module and you must include the ui-grid-move-columns directive on your grid element.

By default column moving will be enabled for all the columns of the grid. To disable it for all columns of grid property enableColumnMoving of grid options can be used. To specifically enable or disable column moving for a specific column property enableColumnMoving of column definitions can be used.

Columns can be repositioned by either dragging and dropping them to specific position or by using this gridApi method gridApi.colMovable.moveColumn(oldPosition, newPosition).
